meanings.sent1: The article was deemed publishable by the editor.
meanings.sent2: The author submitted a publishable manuscript to the journal.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought its meow was so publishable that it demanded treats.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and publishable as a headline on a newspaper.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a talking dog was so publishable that it became an instant hit.

meanings.sent1: The document was finally declared publishable after revisions.
meanings.sent2: The novel was not publishable due to its controversial content.
meanings.sent3: The penguin believed its dance moves were so publishable that it auditioned for a talent show.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were as raw and publishable as a bestselling memoir.
meanings.sent5: The secret treasure map was so publishable that it attracted treasure hunters from far and wide.
